name: Don't break the egg!
description:
DON'T BREAK THE EGG: BACON DISASTER
Don't break the egg, but also knock some slices of bacon and build your way to them! 
Bacon has taken over the world! Use your building skills and powers to help this egg destroy all of the bacon. Some slices of bacon can even move.

Watch out for your egg, because it can break if it touches the floor or falls from too high.  Your goal is to knock all bacons and don't get broken at the same time.
Your buildings break after 2 seconds, you can "build up" to get egg higher.

Left Mouse Button - build your way for the egg
R - restart the current level

All assets and music are made by me, however, the idea is from Wishforge.
